name: lebanese
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
coming from or relating to Lebanon or its people: Her father is Lebanese. They live in the Lebanese capital, Beirut.
More examplesFewer examplesThe women are Palestinian, Egyptian, Saudi and Lebanese.Montreal has many small Lebanese cafés where it's possible to get a falafel plate or mezze.My father, who was an Iraqi, and my Lebanese mother took the family to Baghdad. "I'm Lebanese," she tells us, "I have to feel I have got value for money."This happened a short time ago on the Lebanese border.

[ C ] plural Lebanese a person from Lebanon: His father was a Lebanese. Most Lebanese wear the same styles of clothing as do people in Western nations.
More examplesFewer examplesThe young men are a 21-year-old German and a 23-year-old Lebanese.Lebanese call this lentil pilaff "um-zhad-dtha-dah."The Lebanese love to talk and have a tradition of hospitality and good cooking.

the Lebanese [ plural ]
the people of Lebanon: The Lebanese are great traders and entrepreneurs. "If only the English made sandwiches like the Lebanese", he said.
